p: The mass signals of raw data files from GC-MS analyses were extracted and aligned by metAlign software [ 20], producing 3222 entrances. Subsequently, the data was reduced by MSClust software [ 21], resulting in 79 reconstructed metabolites. Finally, the processed data was statistically analysed by Metaboanalyst 4.0 platform [ 22] using OrthoPLSDA. For OrthoPLSDA, the data was normalized by median and log average transformations.
